rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views of the garden.
Modern dining space with ample natural light and connection to the garden.
Well-equipped kitchen designed for efficiency with large windows ensuring brightness and airflow.
Luxurious master bedroom with attached bathroom. Placed in a calm corner of the house.
Cozy secondary bedroom with a private balcony offering garden views.
Well-designed third bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.
Entertainment area with high-end audio-visual systems and comfortable seating.
Dedicated space for laundry, storage and other utilities.

openings.description: Grand entrance aligning with Vastu principles and designed to welcome positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window on the south-east facade opening towards the garden.

additional_features: Large garden spanning the south and east sides with native landscaping.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light.
Home theater in an optimal location for acoustics.
